title: Account permanently suspended for no reason
body: I played two games today, both of which went totally normal. Half an hour later I went to play another game, but I was banned. I was banned for "malicious 3rd party programs". I don't use any hacks, and honestly I'm not even good enough to warrant suspicion. I am a casual player and this account has taken me a painfully long time to develop, and I hope I haven't lost it forever due to something out of my control.
